rconfig.server.title: Dedicated Server
rconfig.server.desc: Properties that can be can update real-time.
rconfig.server.properties.white-list.des: If this is enabled, only the users in the white list can access the server.
rconfig.server.properties.max-players.de: The maximum number of players that can play on the server at the same time.
rconfig.server.properties.motd.desc: The message that is displayed in the server list.
rconfig.server.properties.allow-flight.d: If this is enabled, players are allowed to fly in the server, usually needed in a modded server.
rconfig.server.properties.pvp.desc: If this is enabled, players can attack each other.
rconfig.server.properties.enforce-whitel: If this is enabled, only the users in the white list can access the server, if users are on the server that are not in the whitelist they will be kicked.
rconfig.ui.constant.mod_configs.descript: Select a config to view or edit.
